description:
Hello Bristol Gophers 👋!

We're keeping our talks online for now.

Speakers:

🗣 Alexander Joseph Trelore - //go:embed

The embed pragma landed in Go 1.16 and can be used for a variety of things. Alexander will talk about some examples of go pragmas before 1.16, then dive into the new go:embed directive. He will then finish off with a few examples.

Alexander has been a Go focused developer for almost 4 years, he helps run the Go Bristol Meetup. He loves talking about new tech to anyone and everyone, if you're trying out Go feel free to reach out to him.

⏰ Schedule:

- 18:00-18:05 intro/welcome
- 18:05-18:50 first speaker
- 18:50-19:00 farewell/next event info

📣 We are looking for help with organising! If you or anyone you know would like to help, give us a shout! As you can see, our pun game especially is in dire need of help

📣 Help us grow! JetBrains offers free licences to meet-ups with attendance greater than 30. If we can reach this, we will apply and be handing it out as a prize at events.

📍 - Online
title: Go(ne online) - //go:embed
